section.description: The Open a URL action launches the user's browser and opens the specified URL. To add this action go to the Control Panel and click on the Code tab. Click the New button in the toolbar, and then select Script (using Action Scripting) from the dropdown. The Code Editor will open. Click the Add New Action button

The Select Action dialog will load. In the Category list scroll down to the Miscellaneous category. From the Action list on the right select Open a URL. This will load the Script Genie for Open a URL.

step.description: In the URL to Open field enter either a URL or an expression that evaluates to a URL. Note that the expression must begin with an equal sign "=" and must be quoted.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
